item.description:
Malheureusement, le temps ne fait pas beau. L'evennement c'est annul√©e.



Special Event! Une nouvelle idee!
This is a potluck picnic languages party with music and fireworks! There are many more people coming than the RSVP shows.
The Trinity College quadrangle is a large, green lawn surrounded by their beautiful stone old-English style buildings. At 8:00 there will be a carillon concert coming from the chapel tower. Then at dark the Hartford riverfront fireworks show will begin. Many people gather at Trinity to watch the show because we sit up on a hill and the fireworks are visible from there. This is a summer gathering for both the French and German meetup groups so it will be open to both. If you speak both French and German, you will be able to talk a lot! Parking is available all over the campus and on the streets. Bring: some food to share, a blanket or chair, and a spirit of fun! There will probably be a Tour Eiffel sur une table au centre de la pelouse, un drapeau francais comme d'habitude.
Merci

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: EVENT CANCELLED TOO RAINY-Meetup pique-nique et feux d'artifice
